description.en: Add content (blocks) to the end of an existing Notion page or block.
description.de: Füge Inhalt (Blöcke) am Ende einer bestehenden Notion-Seite oder eines Blocks hinzu.

vars.API_KEY: env:NOTION_API_KEY|Get your API key from Notion Integrations at https://www.notion.so/my-integrations

description.en: The ID of the page or block to append to.

inputs.name: Children

description.en: JSON array of block objects to append. See Notion API docs for structure.

inputs.bot: JSON array of block objects. Example: [{"object": "block", "type": "paragraph", "paragraph": {"rich_text": [{"type": "text", "text": {"content": "Hello world"}}]}}]
